64024.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Grandma? What's going on?<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64024.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……おばあちゃん？
　いったい　どうしたんです？<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64025.en:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>You see, young man? This time, you and
your companion, monster, will defeat
the enemy.<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64025.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>「いいか　若いの？
　こたびの戦い　必ず　仲間の魔物とともに
　敵を倒してくるのだぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64026.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Grandma? Why? Fabel's life is at
stake. Now is not the time.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64026.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「おばあちゃん？　どうして……。
　ファーベルの命が　かかってるんですよ？
　今は　そんなこと言ってる場合じゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64027.en:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>Klaha, you should shut up. This is a
battle of monster masters.<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64027.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>「クラハさん。アンタは　だまってな。
　これはね　まもの使いの戦いなのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64028.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I'm sorry, Grandma. I'm sorry for
saying things that were out of line.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64028.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「すみません……　おばあちゃん。
　私なんかが　出過ぎたことを
　言ってしまって……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64029.en:
Okay then . I'm sorry to bother you, but when you ride into a monster merchant's place, be sure to
take your companion MONSTER with you.
64029.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「それでは　<pc>さん。
　お手数ですが　魔物商人の所へ乗り込む時は
　必ず　仲間の魔物を連れていってください。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64030.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Please take care of Fabel for me.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64030.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベルのこと……
　くれぐれも　よろしくお願いしますね。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64031.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>What are you going to do to Fry?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64031.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「……キッズに　何するつもりだッ！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64032.en:
I got sniffed out earlier than I expected. Oh well. It'll be fun to show his former owner how he's
changing.
64032.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「思いのほか　早く　かぎつけられちまったな。
　まあいい。こいつが変わっていく様を
　元飼い主に見せつけるのも　一興だろう。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64033.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Will it change?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64033.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「変わっていく……？<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64034.en:
Fry is not just Small Fry. They are the offspring of a very rare monster Golden Liege Lizard, which is on the
verge of extinction.
64034.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「キッズは　ただのドラゴンキッズじゃない。
　絶滅寸前の超希少な魔物……
　ゴールデンキングリザードの子供さ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64035.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>With this drug I created, they will
grow up quickly and become the most
powerful weapons at my command!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64035.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「オレが作った　このクスリを使えば
　みるみるうちに成長し　そして
　オレの言いなりとなる最強の兵器と化す！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64036.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>So you want Fry to attack Lendor.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64036.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「それで　キッズに
　レンドアを襲わせるのか……。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64037.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Yes, that's right! The destruction of
Lendor Island was a demonstration, so
to speak!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64037.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「ああ　そうだ！　レンドア島壊滅は
　いわば　デモンストレーション！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64038.en:
If we succeed in this, we will have a huge following among the important people in the underworld who are
looking for the power of the monster! We, the monster merchants, will gain great wealth!
64038.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「これが成功すれば　魔物のチカラを求める
　裏社会の要人たちから　引く手あまた！
　我ら魔物商人は　巨万の富を得る！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64039.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I can't forgive them. You treat us
like that.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64039.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「ゆるせねえ……。
　魔物たちを　そんなふうに扱いやがって……。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64040.en:
Monsters were originally nothing more than the enemy of humans. I'd like to praise you for finding new value in
them.
64040.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「ふっ。魔物は　元々　人間の敵でしかない存在。
　その魔物に　新たな価値を見出してやったことを
　ほめてほしいくらいだがな。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64041.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Okay, chit-chat's over. It's time to
start Sho.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64041.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「さあ　おしゃべりは終わりだ。
　そろそろ　ショーを始めようじゃないか。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64042.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>See you later, Fry.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64042.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「じゃあな　キッズ……。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64043.ja: <start_lip_sync m04503 _normal m00001>「ガ…ギャギャガ……グァアアア……！<stop_lip_animation m04503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64044.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「キッズーーーーーッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64045.ja: <start_lip_sync m04503 _normal m00001>「グウォォォォオオオオ！！<stop_lip_animation m04503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64046.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Beautiful. This is the Golden Liege
Lizard.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64046.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「美しい……。
　これが　ゴールデンキングリザード……。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64047.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I won't let you do what you want. I
will restore the bond between me and
Fry!<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64047.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「お前らの好きにはさせねえ……。
　オレとキッズの絆……　取り戻してみせる！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64048.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「うらぁぁぁぁぁ！！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64050.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Hahahaha! You idiot! There's no way
that a loser like you can tame the
most powerful monster of all!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64050.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「ハーッハッハッハ！！　バカか！
　お前みたいなハンパ者が　この最強の魔物を
　手なずけられるワケが　なかろう！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64052.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>I think you're...<cs_pchero>You said that. They were trying to
destroy our mission to destroy Lendor
Island.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64052.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「お前は　たしか　<cs_pchero>と言ったな。
　さしずめ　オレたちのレンドア島壊滅作戦を
　ぶち壊しにきたってところか。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64053.en:
Unfortunately, as you can see, Fry has been transformed. His men are probably now unleashing Item Number 13 and
launching a raid on Lendor Island.
64053.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「残念だが　この通り　キッズは変身を果たした。
　部下たちも　今頃　商品ナンバー１３を放ち
　レンドア島急襲を開始していることだろう。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64054.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>But we've come this far! Let me show
you with my own body how powerful the
reborn Fry is!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64054.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「だが　せっかく　ここまで来たのだ！
　生まれ変わったキッズが　どれほどの実力を
　秘めているか　身をもって教えてやろう！！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64055.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Let's go, monster master!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64055.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「いくぞぉぉぉ　まもの使い！！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64056.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>That's ridiculous, Fabel. How does it
feel to have your hand bitten by your
own dog, or rather, your own monster?<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64056.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「こっけいだな　ファーベル。
　飼い犬……　いや　飼い魔物に
　手をかまれた気分は　どうだ？<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64057.en:
You're not going to stop, are you?He was a fool not to back down when he was shown the overwhelming difference in ability. He was a fool not to back
down after being shown the overwhelming difference in ability.
64057.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「こりずに　また来たのか　<cs_pchero>。
　圧倒的な実力差を　見せつけられても
　引き下がらないとは　愚かなヤツだ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64058.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Oh well, let's give the Golden Liege
Lizard a little more prep work before
we board Lendor Island.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64058.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「まあいい。レンドア島に乗り込む前に
　もう少し　ゴールデンキングリザードに
　準備運動をさせてやるとするか。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64059.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Let's go, monster master!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64059.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「いくぞぉぉぉ　まもの使い！！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64060.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Damn. The Golden Liege Lizard is down?<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64060.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「クッ。ゴールデンキングリザードが
　やられた……だと……？<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64061.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>Oh my god!!!<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64062.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I'm sorry, I didn't mean to come all
this way. I was really worried about
Fabel.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64062.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ごめんなさい　こんな所まで。
　どうしても　ファーベルが心配で……<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64063.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ああっ　ファーベルッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64064.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>That eye color. No way. Is that Fry?
Oh, my God.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64064.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「あの目の色……。
　まさか　あれが　キッズなんですか……？
　なんてこと……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64065.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Oh! What a life force. Go Golden Liege
Lizard, kill them all!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64065.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「おお！　なんという　生命力……。
　いけえぇっ　ゴールデンキングリザード！
　ここにいるヤツらを　皆殺しにしろ！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64066.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Now Fry is simply destruction
incarnate. If left unchecked, many
people will be killed.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64066.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「今のキッズは　単なる破壊の化身……。
　このまま　放っておけば
　たくさんの人が犠牲になるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64067.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001><cs_pchero> Later life. Make it easy on Fry.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64067.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>さん……　後生です。
　キッズを……楽にしてあげてください。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64068.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「待って。母さん……。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64069.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベル……？<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64071.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>The Bond Between Me and Fry<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64071.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「オレと　キッズの絆……<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64072.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I will definitely get it back.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64072.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「絶対に……取り戻してみせる……。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64073.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「うおおおおおおぉぉぉぉぉぉ！！！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64075.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Hmmm. You guys are really close.
You're like brothers.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64075.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ふふふ。
　あなたたちって　本当に　仲がいいのね。
　まるで　兄弟みたい。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64076.en:
<start_lip_sync n02287 _normal m00001>It's obvious, isn't it? Fry and I have
been doing this for a long, long time.<stop_lip_animation n02287 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64076.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02287 _normal m00001>「あったりまえだろ！
　キッズとオレは　ずーっと　ずぅぅっと……<stop_lip_animation n02287 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64077.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I'm with you all the way!<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64077.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「ずぅぅーーーーっと　一緒なんだからな！！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64078.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「ウソ……だろ…………。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64079.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Ha. Fry is back to normal! I did it! I
did it! I did it!<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64079.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「はは……。
　キッズが……キッズが　元に戻ったぞ！！
　やった　やった……やったーーー！！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64080.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Damn. I guess we're retreating for
now.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64080.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「チッ。ここは　ひとまず　退却か……。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64081.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「うわぁぁぁぁッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64082.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「お　おばあちゃん！？<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64083.en:
I won't let you get away, you scoundrel. I'll make you pay for the crime of playing with the monsters as
you please.
64083.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>「逃がさんぞ　この悪党め。
　魔物たちを好き勝手に　もてあそんだ罪
　たっぷり　つぐなわしてやる。<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64084.en:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>Don't worry, I've already delivered
your minions to Lendor in a huff. Go
to hell with them.<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64084.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>「心配せんでも　お前さんの手下どもは
　もう　ふんじばって　レンドアに届けてきたわ。
　一緒に　地獄を見てきな。<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64085.en: <start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>Fabel And then the young one there.<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64085.ja: <start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>「ファーベル　それから　そこの若いの。<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64086.en:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>The strength of monster master is the
strength of the bond with monster.
Don't forget, both of you.<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64086.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02122 _normal m00001>「まもの使いの強さは　魔物との絆の強さ。
　……忘れるんじゃないよ　ふたりとも。<stop_lip_animation n02122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64087.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベルッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64088.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>You know, I can't tell you how worried
I was about you.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64088.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「まったく　あなたって子はっ
　私が　どれだけ　心配したと……<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64090.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I'm sorry for making you worry all
this time. I've finally made up my
mind.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64090.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「今までずっと　心配させて　ゴメン。
　オレ　ようやく　心が決まったよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64091.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I'm going to be.<cs_pchero>I want to be a cool monster master
like my father.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64091.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「オレ　なるよ。
　<cs_pchero>さんや　父さんみたいな
　かっこいい　まもの使いになる。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64092.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベル…………。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64093.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>You are such a child.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64093.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ホントにもう　あなたって子は……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64094.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Heh. Mom, it's like this. I'll walk
you home.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64094.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「へへ。母さん　こんなだし
　オレが　家まで送ってくよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64095.en:
Thank you for everything. I think I was able to hold on until the end because you taught me about the bond
with monster.
64095.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「……<cs_pchero>さん　今まで　ありがとう。
　アンタが　魔物との絆を教えてくれたから
　オレ　最後まで　踏ん張れたんだと思う……。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64096.en:
somedayI'll become a monster master strong enough to defeat the likes of you, so let's compete with each other's
monsters!
64096.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「いつか　<cs_pchero>さんに　負けないくらい
　強い　まもの使いになってみせるから
　そん時は　お互いの魔物で　勝負しようぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64097.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>See ya.<cs_pchero>I'm ahead of you! I'll go ahead!<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64097.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「じゃあな　<cs_pchero>さん！
　オレは　先に行ってるよ！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64098.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I apologize for the embarrassment I
showed you earlier. Please rest
assured that I am back safe and sound.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64098.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「先ほどは　なんだか　お恥ずかしいところを
　お見せして　申し訳ありませんでした。
　無事　戻ってこられたので　ご安心ください。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64099.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>So, <pc>. As soon as I came
back here, I received a letter from
Mr. Sigal. I will read it.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64099.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「それでですね　<pc>さん……。
　こちらに戻ってくるなり　シガール様から
　一通　手紙が届いたのです。読みますね。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64100.en:
Mi Seth Klaha and monster master, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for saving my beloved Lendor from the
monster merchant's clutches.
64100.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……ミセス・クラハ　そして　まもの使い。
　我が愛するレンドアを　魔物商人の魔の手より
　救ってくれたこと　心より　感謝申し上げる。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64101.en:
I am more impressed by the monster master location than the sea. I would like to do my best to introduce this
proud location to the world.
64101.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「私は　まもの使いという職業に　海よりも深い
　感銘を受けた。この誇り高い職業の素晴らしさを
　世界中に　紹介していくことに尽力したい。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64102.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Lendor is a crossroads of the world
where many people come and go, with
liner boats and train stations.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64102.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「我がレンドアは　定期船と鉄道駅を有し
　多くの人々が行き交う　世界の交差路……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64103.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Your noble achievements will soon be
spreading around the world.Mayor of
Port Town Lendor Sigal<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64103.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「貴君らの　かがやかしい功績は
　またたく間に　世界へと広まっていくであろう。
　　　　　　　　　　港町レンドア町長　シガール<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64104.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>It finally came true. My husband and
I's dream came true.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64104.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……ついに　かなったんです。
　私と……夫の夢が。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64105.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Fabel was as pleased as if it were her
own when she read this letter.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64105.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベルも　この手紙を読むと
　自分のことのように　よろこんでくれました。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64106.en:
Now it's my turn to make my dream come true, she said and left for a training trip with Fry. He is so simple, isn't
he?
64106.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「今度は　自分が　夢をかなえる番だと言って
　キッズと　修業の旅に出てしまいましたが……。
　ホント　単純ですよね　あの子ったら。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64107.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001><pc>. It is thanks to you
that we have come this far. Thank you
so much.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64107.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん……。私たちが
　ここまで来られたのは　あなたのおかげです。
　本当に　ありがとうございました。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64108.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Even that harsh grandmother recognized
you as one of her own, and she gave
you a present.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64108.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「あのきびしい　おばあちゃんも
　あなたのことを　一人前だと認め
　プレゼントを　用意してくださいました。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64109.en:
This is the Proof of MON held by the true monster master, please receive this along with your reward from
Sigal.
64109.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「これは　真の　まもの使いが持つ
　まもの使いの証。シガール様からの報酬と
　一緒に　こちらを受け取ってください。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64110.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Please accept this along with your
reward from Mr. Sigal.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64110.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「シガール様からの報酬と　一緒に
　どうか　こちらを受け取ってください。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

64111.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Actually, there is another Proof of
MON here.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64111.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……じつは　ここに　もうひとつ
　まもの使いの証があります。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64112.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>This is my husband's Proof of MON. He
was clutching this and collapsed.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64112.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「これは　夫の　まもの使いの証。
　夫は　これをにぎりしめて　倒れていました。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64113.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Someday, when Fabel becomes a full-
fledged monster master, give it to me.
That's what I thought he was saying.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64113.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「いつか　ファーベルが　一人前の
　まもの使いになったら　渡してくれ……。
　私には　そう言ってるような気がしたのです。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64114.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Next my dream is to give this to
Fabel. <pc> Please keep
supporting me!<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
64114.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「次の　私の夢は　これをファーベルに渡すこと。
　<pc>さん　応援していてくださいね！<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
